channel.title: Swedish Tech Events
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2021-09-22 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
item.description: Like to limit WIP (Work-In-Process), visualization of workflows and self-organizing teams? Want to meet others like you and learn more about Lean and Agile? We are few enthusiasts who meet every Wednesday morning since May 2010, to exchange thoughts and experiences over a cup ...

item.title: 2021-11-11 17:30 Teaser: Kubernetes - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Mikael is a consultant at West Forest Techno...

item.title: 2021-09-02 18:00 Code 'n' Chill 2 - Norrköping Software Development
item.description: Looking forward to folks coming together to hang out and share best practices. It will be a great setting to chat and learn from each other while having some fun with code. The plan is to chat about the code a bit and play some coding games. If you can, bring a laptop. ...

item.description: Beroende på Corona-situationen så blir det inga möten på onsdagar en tid framöver.

item.title: 2021-09-04 13:00 30 years of Linux - picnic! - Uppsala Linux User Group
item.description: Let's have a picnic in the park to celebrate 30th anniversary of Linux! Bring: - a blanket - food and drinks - a friend - laptop with a well charged battery And of course: keep a distance, and stay home if you've got symptoms. Info on websi...

item.title: 2021-09-01 17:00 Onsdagshäng med utvecklare - Nyköping Developers
item.description: Kravlöst häng med utvecklare på Mårtens Hus. Om vädret tillåter sitter vi ute, annars siktar vi på de sköna sofforna på övervåningen. Det finns goda pizzor och fina öl (även alkoholfritt).

item.title: 2021-09-29 19:00 Natural Language Generation and how United Robots generates millions of articles - Örnsköldsvik Developer Meetup
item.description: The last Wednesday of every month we invite you to a meetup at House Be. This time we'll learn from Henning Johannesson, Chief Product Officer, how United Robots used robots to create a service that generates millions of articles from rich data for customers all over the globe...

item.title: 2021-11-24 19:00 ovik.dev - Monthly Meetup - Örnsköldsvik Developer Meetup
item.description: The last Wednesday of every month we invite you to a meetup at House Be. We'll update the event with more context when it draws near. This ovik.dev meetup is hosted by CoreIT. Hope to see you there!
